name: Random.tg
description: 🟢RANDOM is a decentralized lottery with cashback and double winnings. 🔎 The lottery's smart contract guarantees the fairness and transparency of the transactions. 🔒 The chance of winning when playing on TON is 40% or 30% cash back in $RANDOM tokens on a lose; 🏆The chance of winning when playing on $RANDOM is 45% or 100% of the lost tokens are burned; 🔐35% of the issue on Tonraffles is frozen. Every month, defrosting will occur in equal parts and add to LP. 🔒 LP tokens are frozen for 2 years. The rights to the token have been revoked.
